title: Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, Pair up to 100 Speakers,IPX7 Waterproof Speaker Wireless Bluetooth-V5.3, HiFi Stereo Sound, 1100mins Playtime, Portable Speaker for Home, Outdoor, Party
descriptions:
Introducing the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, designed with simplicity in mind for our beloved elderly folks. 

With the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, you can easily pair up to 100 speakers, allowing you to fill your entire home with crystal-clear sound. These speakers are also perfect for outdoor gatherings and parties, as they have a waterproof rating of IPX7, ensuring protection against rain, dust, snow, and splashes.

Featuring the latest Bluetooth version 5.3, the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers provide a seamless connection to your devices. You'll enjoy a HiFi stereo sound experience with balanced sound without distortion, thanks to the advanced audio processing technology and dual speaker drivers with a powerful amplifier module.

Worried about battery life? Don't be! The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers have a battery capacity of 3600mAh, providing more than 15 hours of playtime. When it's time to recharge, simply use the convenient Type C charging port.

The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers are designed with your convenience in mind. The integrated turntable button allows for easier control, and the golden ratio cylindrical body with pure colors adds a touch of elegance to any room.

So why wait? Experience the joy of music with the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers. It's the perfect companion for your home, outdoor adventures, and parties. Enjoy music without any complications!
